text: Piriyadha Varam Vendum () ( Want a boon to not separated) is a 2019-2020 Indian Tamil-language supernatural drama which aired on Zee Tamil. It starring Vimal Venkatesan in the lead with Madhumitha H and Priyanka Shivanna are the female leads. While Mamilla Shailaja Priya in a pivotal role. This series started from 17 June 2019 and ended on 1 August 2020. The story is about A king is torn apart from his lover when his mother murders her to get him married to her niece. However, they are all reborn, which gives the king and his lady-love a second chance to unite. ==Synopsis== A queen named Chitra is seen killing Amaravati, a peasant girl, so that her son, who was in love with her, cannot marry her. The queen did not approve the relationship, as the girl was poor and not of the same caste as the boy. The queen wants to get her son married to her niece Mithrasena. The niece helps the queen in eliminating Amaravati. So they killed Amaravati and the King. Now after a millon of years, they all are reborn, which they get a second chance to get unite. Will the king and Amaravati will get unite or not forms rest of the story. ==Cast== * Vimal Venkatesan as Rishi * Madhumitha H as Durga / Amaravathi * Priyanka Shivanna as Madhu / Mithrasena * Mamilla Shailaja Priya as Chitradevi: Rishi's mother * Akhila Krishnan as Aparna: Rishi's elder sister * Duraimani as Sundarapandi: Rishi's elder brother-in-law; Aparna's husband * Akshara as Kaveri: Sundarapandi's younger sister * Andrew Jesudoss as Ruthraiyya * Dhekshitha Jaganathan as Durga's sister (2019) ==Production== This series was setup with 17,500 sq.feet of palace with 2 crore of budget. ==International broadcast== The series was released on 17 June 2019 on Zee Tamil. The show was also broadcast internationally on the network's international channels. * It airs in Sri Lanka, Singapore, the United States, Europe, Malaysia, Mauritius, the Middle East, Africa, East Asia, South Africa, Australasia and North America on Zee Tamil and Zee Tamil HD. * Episodes can be viewed with the app OZEE and ZEE5. * It is also available via Internet TV services Lebara and YuppTV. ==References== ==Other websites== * Zee Tamizh Official website Category:Zee Tamil Programming Category:Tamil-language television series Category:2019 Tamil-language television series debuts
